Title: Requires the department of transportation to provide a list of legal clearance heights for bridges to certain drivers
Summary: Requires the department of transportation to provide a list of legal clearance heights for bridges to owners or operators of trucks, commercial vehicles, tractors, tractor-trailer combinations, tractor-semitrailer combinations, or tractor-trailer-semitrailer combinations.
LawCode: Amd ยง1621, V & T L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the vehicle and traffic law, in relation to requiring the department of transportation to provide a list of legal clearance heights for bridges to certain drivers
